posts.post_title: anyone have a low condition t202 shean/chance?
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David R
I have the same card in an SGC 10.  The front looks very nice for the grade (like an SGC 40 or 50) but it has some minor paper loss on the back.  The paper loss is well-placed on a few of the edges so you can still read all of the writing.    

Email me if you're interested.
